questions.q_wording: How do you feel right now?/¿Cómo te sientes ahora mismo?
questions.q_options: very sad/muy triste, sad/triste, normal, happy/feliz, very happy/muy feliz

questions.q_wording: Using technology makes me more productive/Usar la tecnología me hace más productivo
questions.q_options: Strongly disagree/Muy en desacuerdo, Strongly agree/Muy de acuerdo

questions.q_wording: Using technology makes your daily life more pleasant/Usar la tecnología hace mi vida más agradable
questions.q_options: Strongly disagree/Muy en desacuerdo, Strongly agree/Muy de acuerdo

questions.q_wording: Integrating technology into your daily life is not difficult for you/Me resulta sencillo integrar la tecnología en mi vida diaria
questions.q_options: Strongly disagree/Muy en desacuerdo, Strongly agree/Muy de acuerdo

questions.q_wording: You are not hesitant to use computers without help of an expert/No tengo reparo en usar la tecnología sin la ayuda de alguien
questions.q_options: Strongly disagree/Muy en desacuerdo, Strongly agree/Muy de acuerdo

questions.q_wording: You are comfortable using technology for work and daily tasks/Me siento cómodo usando la tecnología en mi trabajo y vida diaria
questions.q_options: Strongly disagree/Muy en desacuerdo, Strongly agree/Muy de acuerdo

questions.q_wording: Please, rate how practical the app you tested is/¿Te parece práctica la app?
Please, rate how predictable the app you tested is/¿Te parece predecible?
Please, rate how structured the app you tested is/¿Te parece estructurada?
Please, rate how simple to use the app you tested is/¿Te parece simple de usar?
Please, rate how stylish the app you tested is/¿Te parece estilosa?
Please, rate how premium the app you tested is/¿Te parece premium?
Please, rate how creative the app you tested is/¿Te parece creativa?
Please, rate how captivating the app you tested is/¿Te parece interesante?
Please, rate how beautiful the app you tested is/¿Te parece atractiva?
Please, rate how good the app you tested is/¿Te parece buena?
